caption: DAO - Configure Treasury
doc: Send governance tokens into the DAO treasury.

AMQ.caption: Percent To Treasury
AMQ.doc: The percent of the governance tokens the user holds that they will send to the DAO treasury.
AMQ.name: percent_to_treasury

AMR.caption: DAO Address
AMR.doc: The smart contract address of the DAO we are configuring.
AMR.name: vote_address

AMS.caption: Governance Token Address
AMS.doc: The contract address of the governance token for the DAO.
AMS.name: token_address
